page.title: 06COMMUNITIES 1
page.content: {Great Hollands The first houses were built in 1969.In 1976 the towns first health centre was opened.The streets were branched off a circular road in alphabetical order. Great Hollands has light industry. {Hanworth } Development began in 1971.The Pines school opened in 1974.A small supermarket was built and later in 1976 a pub called the'Cannie Man'.A community centre was adjoined to the Pines. {Birch Hill } Building started in 1974.In 1976 the first houses were finished.As Hanworth and Crown Wood are close to Birch Hill and the town centre is quite far away the shops needed were of greater variety.In 1975 an annex of Easthampstead Park School opened.
